page.title: 12LILLESHALL AND CHURCH ASTON.
page.content: Both{Lilleshall and Church Aston villages have{Cricket Clubs. {Lilleshall}has a field and pavilion in the village and plays 3 teams as well as Youth teams.{Church Aston}have a Club but no ground in the village They play at{Parson Barracks, {Donnington. Many local people use{The National {Sports Centre at Lilleshall}for tennis,badminton,football,athletics etc.but there is also the{Talbot {Sports Centre}in{Lilleshall}village which offers tennis,netball or 5-a-side football and is open free of charge to the public.The four{public {houses}in the area,all have darts teams but one has teams playing tennis ,golf,shooting 10 pin bowling etc. There are{evening classes}in Aerobics, keep-fit and dancing in the area.
